[Perfect Debilitation](/Feats.aspx?ID=126) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>

<column gap="tiny">

---

You have perfected the formulas for bombs that impede your enemies. When you use [Debilitating Bomb](/Feats.aspx?ID=103), your target avoids the condition the bomb imposes only if it critically succeeds at its saving throw.
